poemsDataJson.list_full: 嵐(あらし)吹(ふ)く 三室(みむろ)の山(やま)の もみぢ葉(ば)は 竜田(たつた)の川(かは)の 錦(にしき)なりけり
poemsDataJson.list_full_en: By the wind storm's blast//From Mimuro's mountain slopes//Maples leaves are torn,//Which turn Tatsuta River//Into a rich brocade.
poemsDataJson.list_full_romaji: Arashi fuku|Mimuro no yama no|Momiji-ba wa|Tatsuta no kawa no|Nishiki nari keri
poemsDataJson.list_torifuda: たつたのかはの にしきなりけり
poemsDataJson.author: 能因法師(のういんほうし)
poemsDataJson.poem_theme: 竜田川に浮かぶもみじ葉の錦織のような美しさ
